article_title: 5 Obamacare Website Failures That Could Have Been Avoided - Page: 1

article_metadata.news_keywords: Obamacare site failures, Software security, BSIMM Study, Software security testing, Website security testing, Healthcare.gov security flaws, obacare site, obamacare website, obamacare,

og.description: An update to a longstanding study of software security activities at dozens of leading organizations found similarities in their approach that can be applied to any business seeking security improvements, including those helping to fix the glitch-riddled Obamacare site.
og.title: 5 Obamacare Website Failures That Could Have Been Avoided

article_metadata.keywords: Obamacare site failures, Software security, BSIMM Study, Software security testing, Website security testing, Healthcare.gov security flaws, obacare site, obamacare website, obamacare,
article_metadata.description: The troubled Obamacare website could have benefited from the software security best practices identified in a newly released BSIMM study of activities at 67 organizations. Page: 1
